name: Quack Yourself Together
description:
This is a submission for KiwiJam 2022

Play as Duck (in Pieces) and collect all your body parts together. Avoid obstacles along the way and try to reach your other duck friends on the other side of the pool.

Made using Unreal Engine.

Team members:
Ben Reynolds
Nathan Reynolds
Alex Liang
Cameron
Andi Liu / 刘安迪
Edward Ferdian
